mapper.select: SELECT IA.ST_NAME ST_NAME, FL.FOOD_NAME AS FOOD_NAME, IA.ST_LOCATION AS ST_LOCATION FROM ST_FOOD SF JOIN ST_LIST SL ON SF.ST_NUM = SL.ST_NUM JOIN FOOD_LABEL FL ON SF.FOOD_NUM = FL.FOOD_NUM JOIN IN_PROCESS IP ON SL.IN_PROCESS_NUM = IP.IN_PROCESS_NUM JOIN IN_APPLY IA ON IP.IN_APPLY_NUM = IA.IN_APPLY_NUM WHERE SL.ST_NUM = #{st_num}

SELECT NVL(ROUND(AVG(STAR_SCORE), 2), 0) AS STAR_SCORE , NVL(COUNT(RV_BOX.RV_NUM), 0) AS REVIEW_COUNT FROM ST_LIST SL LEFT JOIN LIKE_BOX ON SL.ST_NUM = LIKE_BOX.ST_NUM LEFT JOIN RV_BOX ON SL.ST_NUM = RV_BOX.ST_NUM WHERE SL.ST_NUM = #{st_num}

SELECT SL.ST_NUM AS ST_NUM, OC.DAY_NUM AS DAY_NUM, WDL.DAY_NAME AS DAY_NAME , OC.START_TIME AS START_TIME, OC.END_TIME AS END_TIME FROM ST_OPENCLOSE OC JOIN ST_LIST SL ON OC.ST_NUM = SL.ST_NUM JOIN WEEKDAY_LABEL WDL ON OC.DAY_NUM = WDL.DAY_NUM WHERE SL.ST_NUM = #{st_num} ORDER BY DAY_NUM
SELECT MENU_NAME, PRICE, IMAGE_LINK FROM MENU LEFT JOIN ST_LIST SL ON SL.ST_NUM = MENU.ST_NUM WHERE SL.ST_NUM = #{st_num}
